About Jack in the Box Jack in the Box is a Fast Food restaurant located at 238 E Felicita Ave in Escondido, CA 92025. Jack in the Box has been described as an Good Fast Food restaurant and has received an average rating of 5 by our members. Quick Facts
Cuisine: Fast Food Accepts Credit Card: Yes Parking: N/A
Atmosphere: N/A Take Reservations: Yes Serves Alcohol: N/A Smoking Allowed: No
